name: The Lonely Kaiju
description:
Explore what waits in store for a Kaiju just trying to connect with those around them. So many fear you, but perhaps not everyone! I wonder if there is a way to make you look more approachable to them...

Made by "John the game dev and the gamer bundle", Ethan "Gainz", Kayt "Lynn-Isle", @HeyMrMcMister, and @Ombremonde.
developers: John the game dev and the gamer bundle
